channel.title: Item spawn
channel.description: How do i add item spawns in server with and itemspawnpoint.java i would need an itemspawn.java file and other file too, how do i make the in game item spawns, please help/

you also need spawnpoints.cfg, you should find all the info by going through another source and searching for: spawnâ€¦

item.title: Item spawn
item.dc:creator: @xxchainxx xxchainxx
item.description:
@xxchainxx wrote:

its easy lol

ok look at other spawns in yout itemspawn
ex: ItemHandler.addItem(347, 3066, 3952, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // herring

ok the first set of numbers is the id of the item the next two sets are the coords and the next 1 is how many its going to spawn in the one area

just find another 1 paste it under it and find new coords and the item id and there u go

Read full topic
